search.query:
|makeresults |eval usetstats="Yes" |eval notstats="No" |eval tstatstag=`tstatstag` |eval tstats_compute=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats dc(resource.data.id) as Count where","") |eval tstats_simple=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats count where","") |eval tstats_nulls=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats fillnull_value=\"-\" count where","") |eval stats_count=if(tstatstag=="No", "|stats count ", "")
|eval tstats_by_name=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "by name","") |eval tstats_by_vpcs=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "by resource.data.id, name, resource.data.routingConfig.routingMode, resource.data.subnetworks{}","")
|eval tstats_by_subnets=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "by resource.data.network, resource.location, resource.data.name, resource.data.ipCidrRange, resource.data.gatewayAddress","") |eval tstats_by_routes=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "by resource.data.id, name, resource.data.network, resource.data.nextHopNetwork, resource.data.priority, resource.data.destRange, resource.data.description","")

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Network" $stats_count$ by name |eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |stats count by projectid

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Network" $stats_count$ by resource.data.id, name, resource.data.routingConfig.routingMode, resource.data.subnetworks{} |eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |eval vpcname=replace(name,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1")
|search projectid=$project_tok$ |rename resource.data.subnetworks{} as subnetworks, resource.data.routingConfig.routingMode as "Routing Mode" |rex max_match=30 field=subnetworks "https:\/\/www.googleapis.com\/compute\/v1\/projects\/\S*\/regions\/(?<regionval>\S*)\/subnetworks\/(?<subnetnames>\S*)" |eval subs=regionval.":".subnetnames |stats list(subs) as "Region:Subnet Name" by projectid, vpcname, "Routing Mode" |rename projectid as "Project ID", vpcname as "VPC Name"

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Subnetwork" $stats_count$ by resource.data.network, resource.location, resource.data.name, resource.data.ipCidrRange, resource.data.gatewayAddress |rename resource.data.network as network |eval projectid=replace(network,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |eval vpcname=replace(network,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |search projectid=$project_tok$ |stats list(resource.location) as Location list(resource.data.name) as "SubNet Name" list(resource.data.ipCidrRange) as "IP CIDR Range", list(resource.data.gatewayAddress) as "Gateway Address", by projectid, vpcname |rename vpcname as "VPC Name"

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Route" $stats_count$ by resource.data.id, name, resource.data.network, resource.data.nextHopNetwork, resource.data.priority, resource.data.destRange, resource.data.description |eval ProjectID=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |search ProjectID=$project_tok$ |rename name as Name, resource.data.network as VPC, resource.data.nextHopNetwork as "Next Hop Network", resource.data.priority as Priority, resource.data.destRange as "Dest Range", resource.data.description as Description |table ProjectID, Name, VPC, "Next Hop Network", "Dest Range", Priority, Description

`gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Firewall |spath output=data path=resource.data |eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |search projectid=$project_tok$ |rename resource.data.network as vpcname |eval vpc=replace(vpcname,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |rex max_match=20 field=data "\{\"IPProtocol\":\"(?<Protocol>\w+)\"(,\"ports\":\[(?<Ports>\"[^\]]*))*" |rex max_match=20 field=data "\"sourceRanges\":\[(?<sourceRanges>\"[^\]]*)" |rex max_match=20 field=data "\"sourceTags\":\[(?<sourceTags>\"[^\]]*)" |dedup resource.data.name |table projectid, vpc, resource.data.name, resource.data.priority, resource.data.direction,Protocol, sourceRanges, Ports, sourceTags, resource.data.logConfig.enable, resource.data.description |rename resource.data.name as "Firewall Name", resource.data.priority as Priority, resource.data.direction as "Direction", resource.data.logConfig.enable as "Logs Enabled", resource.data.description as Description
